title: Is Spider-Man 2 Too Short? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.20.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Get 10% off, free shipping, and a free mystery candle for every three you buy at https://immersionfragrances.com

Blessing and Tim celebrate Spider-Man 2 & Super Mario Bros Wonder day, decide if Insomniac should make a Venom game, and answer the question: is Spider-Man 2 too short?
